comment: * @hide Only a subset of ICU is exposed in Android

variables.name: specialMappingName
variables.comment: the name of a special mapping used instead of factor + optional offset.

methods.name: public String getTarget()
methods.comment:
* @return the base unit. *

* For example: * ("meter", "foot", "inch", "mile" ... etc.) have "meter" as a base/root unit.

methods.name: public BigDecimal getOffset()
methods.comment: * @return The offset from this unit to the base unit.

methods.name: public String getConversionRate()
methods.comment: * @return The conversion rate from this unit to the base unit.

methods.name: public String getSpecialMappingName()
methods.comment: * @return The name of the special conversion system for this unit (used instead of factor + optional offset).

methods.name: public String getSystems()
methods.comment: * @return The measurement systems this unit belongs to.
